entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
